body.name: Retro Game Console Retroplay HDD - Plug & Play Emulator Console Built in 60000+ Video Games,Compatible 70+ Emulators,External Gaming Hard Drive Support SATA 3.0,USB 3.0,For Win8.1/10/11（500GB）
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 31 mins
features: 500G Retro Gaming Hard Drive Pre-loaded with over 60,000 video games, compatible with 70 emulators, no downloads, no internet connection, plug-and-play, takes you back to the 80's and 90's with classic games. A small hard disk can upgrade your PC to a retro gaming machine.

Retro Gaming Hard Disk 500G game hard disk Preloaded with a variety of AAA-class large-scale 3D games (tested, the game frame rate is stable, smooth operation, clear picture quality). Adopting SATA3.0 TO USB3.0, the read/write speed is up to 300MB/s, which can effectively reduce the game loading time and game delay effect, providing you with smoother and more stable gaming experience.

Emulator console Hard Disk has rich gaming functions, supporting adding and deleting game files, saving game progress, reading game progress, using game cheats, adjusting game sound effects, quickly skipping game plots, and many other functions (the product manual has a detailed description of the shortcut keys).

Retro Game Console HDD Plug and Play Three steps: (1) Connect the game hard disk to your computer. (USB cable included) (2) Open the game drive folder and click Run Program Installation. (3) Click Start Program to start the game.
Emulator Console 500G Retro Game Hard Disk is compact and portable, supports playing games on PC/Laptop/Smart TV (Windows 8.1 and above), easy to operate, rich in content, plug and play.

We provide you with 30 days free return service (if you are not satisfied with the product within 30 days after purchase, you can return it at any time). We also provide you with lifelong after-sales technical service and 7*24 hours after-sales service. If you don't understand anything, please feel free to contact us, we will reply you as soon as possible (within 12 hours).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great product after all!
reviews.reviewText: So I updated this review and updated scrapers on retrobat. Unfortunately, after the updates on system, some things might seem as though they are lost. NOT REALLY!!! One has to go to scraper settings, scrape for games with missing files. Then reload game list. This might take a bit of time but well worth it!!!! This product is truly awesome. A bit technical but awesome! I like technical!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If correct aspect ratio ain’t important this thing is great
reviews.reviewText: If you want to play arcade games in their proper proportions look elsewhere. If you don’t care then this is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The item was everything I had hoped for and more.
reviews.reviewText: You will not be disappointed in this item. Lots of old school games that i played as a child and brought back so many memories. The only negative i had was so many duplicate games but they are there because of regions. You can easily clean them up as I have and just keep the games for your region. Would highly recommend this to anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars tons of games
reviews.reviewText: So it looks like they bought some 500gb portable drives and flashed the image of all these games to it. There's a ton to choose from, from most of the classic consoles (and some you probably haven't even seen). Controller support is good, but this is all stuff you could get yourself if you are familiar with the concept. The software it runs is free and licensed for non-commercial use, so on top of the possible legality issues with the roms, there's the issue of selling that software.There's also the obvious and hopefully apparent risk of plugging in modified hardware to your computer. I did only very cursory scans and found nothing, but hacking stuff has advanced a lot over the years and now even USB cables can be modified to steal your data. I have no idea if this hard drive is doing that or if these are good spirited pirates trying to make some cash. This is a very cool idea, and I wish it was all legal, but I'm not sure that it is.If you've seen the tiktok videos of those viral handheld gaming consoles this is running the same software front end and thus it looks very similar, the difference here is that it'll run on your PC, which means you'll need to have a powerful enough PC to run all the emulators smoothly, your performance may vary greatly depending on the hardware you've got.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Interesting game variety
reviews.reviewText: I’m pretty sure this is a 500gb hard drive, that PC compatible and had the games downloaded onto it, and left and its original box. The games do work if you have a powerful PC that has some serious graphics card power. It does work I couldn’t find anything wrong with it as far as spyware but what do I know? So far so good I will update if I find anything wrong with it.
